name: Easy Tasty Dates
author: Toni Losada
summary: This is a very easy but good recipe. People will think you are a gourmet chef with these dates filled with chevre cheese and pecans!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Slice open the dates, and stuff each with about 1/2 teaspoon goat cheese
Top each date with a pecan, using the goat cheese to hold the pecans in place
Wrap each date with 1/2 slice bacon
Arrange the wrapped dates on a baking sheet
Bake 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until the bacon is crisp and evenly brown
In a saucepan over medium heat, mix the balsamic vinegar and sugar until thickened
Pour over the dates to serve
